'''''Oliphaunt''''' is an illustrated children's book which reprints [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem "[[Oliphaunt (poem)|Oliphaunt]]" from ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]''. The illustrations were made by Hank Hinton.<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=65760 Oliphaunt.1989] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 18 October 2011)</ref>

In August [[2011]], a new edition illustrated by Dan McGeehan was published by The Child's World, Inc (ISBN 978-1-60973-155-7).<ref>[http://www.amazon.co.uk/Oliphaunt-Poetry-Children-J-Tolkien/dp/1609731557/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1318955838&sr=8-1 Oliphaunt (Poetry for Children)] at [http://www.amazon.co.uk/ref=gno_logo Amazon.co.uk] (accessed 18 October 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?topic_id=1624&forum=9&post_id=8576#forumpost8576 Oliphaunt new edition] at [http://www.tolkienguide.com/ Tolkien Collector's Guide]</ref>
